title: Error installing qt
body:
Installing qt
```
==> Using cached archive: /dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/cache/qt/qt-5.8.0.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/stage/qt-5.8.0-y4bvifi2ekxsnirx7atetykpqzl3wsmb/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.8.0.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/stage/qt-5.8.0-y4bvifi2ekxsnirx7atetykpqzl3wsmb
==> Applied patch qt5-pcre.patch
==> Applied patch btn_trigger_happy.patch
==> Applied patch QTBUG-57656.patch
==> Applied patch QTBUG-58038.patch
==> Ran patch() for qt
==> Building qt [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    './configure' '-no-eglfs' '-no-directfb' '-no-gtk' '-prefix' '/dat/usr/e157618/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/qt-5.8.0-y4bvifi2ekxsnirx7atetykpqzl3wsmb' '-v' '-opensource' '-opengl' '-release' '-shared' '-confirm-license' '-openssl-linked' '-optimized-qmake' '-no-pch' '-system-libpng' '-system-libjpeg' '-system-zlib' '-nomake' 'examples' '-no-dbus' '-qt-xcb' '-skip' 'webengine'
/dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/qt/package.py:326, in configure:
     309      @when('@5.7:')
     310      def configure(self):
     311          config_args = self.common_config_args
     312  
     313          if not sys.platform == 'darwin':
     314              config_args.extend([
     315                  '-qt-xcb',
     316              ])
     317  
     318          if '~webkit' in self.spec:
     319              config_args.extend([
     320                  '-skip', 'webengine',
     321              ])
     322  
     323          configure('-no-eglfs',
     324                    '-no-directfb',
     325                    '-{0}gtk'.format('' if '+gtk' in self.spec else 'no-'),
  >> 326                    *config_args)

See build log for details:
  /tmp/e157618/spack-stage/spack-stage-_kePfd/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-5.8.0/spack-build.out
```
